entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Selectively Enable/Disable HealthChecks #42939
  • IIS functional tests sometimes corrupt IIS config #42934
    Test failures
  • Rename `AddEndpointFilter` to `AddEndpointFilterFactory` #42933
    7.0-rc1
  • Perf regression: endpoint, json #42931
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plaintext #42930
  • Route tooling broke source-build #42927
  • 404 for static assets in a hosted blazor wasm client with UI Components refactored to razor classlib #42924
    .NET 8 Planning
  • signalr? typed HubConnection from console, not the host. #42923
  • Move away from bower as a package manager #42922
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Query params arrays with empty square bracket notation (HTTP GET) #42921
  • Quarantine EnableCoreHostTraceLogging_PipeCaptureNativeLogs #42913
  • Perf regression: fortunes_actix, fortunes_dapper, json_nodejs, plaintext #42912
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes_nodejs, mvc #42911

Closed

  • Load the HTTPS developer certificate from disk instead of the Keychain on macOS #41879
    7.0-rc1
  • Error unprotecting the session cookie #42938
  • Set description for OpenApiResponse #42482
    7.0-rc1
  • Quarantine InvalidProcessPath_ExpectServerError #41856
    Test failures
  • Quarantine ReaderThrowsResetExceptionOnInvalidBody #41812
    Test failures
  • Quarantine ConfigurationChangeStopsInProcess #40628
    Test failures
  • Quarantine ShutdownTests #38951
    Test failures
  • Quarantine ShutdownTimeoutIsApplied #38995
    Test failures
  • Quarantine SetIISLimitMaxRequestBodySizeE2EWorksWithIntMaxValue #41845
    Test failures
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, mvc #42903
  • Improve WebSocket failure on HTTP/1.0 #32674
    7.0-rc1
  • Consider registering the authentication state provider conditionally #41235
    7.0-rc2
  • Update spa templates to facilitate multi-stage docker builds #41275
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ClientAssets package beta not behaving as expected #42472
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Model Binding in Razor Page #42610
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Throw `Exception` if JSInterop calls are made without Blazor Synchronization Context #42616
    7.0-rc1
  • Test Blazor WebAssembly with Edge WASM interpreter ("DrumBrake") #42662
    7.0-rc1
  • Use top level statements does not have an accelerator key in display name for Visual Studio #42719
    7.0-rc1
  • Update project templates to leverage new authentication APIs #41893
    7.0-rc1
  • Explicitly Enumerate the Subset of C# Blazor WASM Supports #42850
  • user-jwts prints error message on `path1` #42794
    7.0-rc1
  • using httprequest pipereader in a custom middleware to read request body #42900
  • Blazor swallows exceptions #42919
  • Question: catch-all route difference between '*' and '**' #42909
  • Apply default memory limit in Mono env #5617
    Backlog
  • Incorporate version numbers into Blazor _framework / _content filenames to force browser resource load #42869
  • Is there a way to drag diagram to design via blazor? #42889
  • Use Blazor as Web Components in JS (to progressively migrate to blazor) #42890
  • Add IStreamClosedFeature #42725
    7.0-rc1
  • HTTP/3: Try to avoid QuicStreamContext.ConnectionClosed cancellation token #42652
    7.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Add missing ConfigureAwait(false) to PolicyHttpMessageHandler #42940
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add analyzer to suggest top level route registration #42937
    area-infrastructure
  • Unquarantine some IIS tests #42932
    area-runtime
  • Wrap Columns that are too long in the Console Table #42929
    area-commandlinetools
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1904577 #42928
    area-mvc
  • Replace incorrect wasm compilation fallback logic. Fixes #42055 partly #42918
    area-blazor, 7.0-rc1
  • HTTP/3: Add QUIC default error code configuration #42915
    area-runtime
  • Quarantine EnableCoreHostTraceLogging_PipeCaptureNativeLogs #42914
    area-runtime
  • Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • macOS dev-certs overhaul #42251
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, blog-candidate, 7.0-rc1
  • Add flaky test to retry #42935
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Add Description to OpenApiResponseBody #42872
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Update retry list for helix-matrix failures #42925
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Error when Http/1.0 attempts to upgrade #40006
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Consider registering the authentication state provider conditionally #41247
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Update templates to incorporate net7 changes #42802
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bea621c` to `7735334` #42894
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `960bb9a` to `7aa1fe7` #42893
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix up project search scenarios when no option is provided #42860
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts, 7.0-rc1
  • Update SDK #42907
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • HTTP/3: Avoid per-request cancellation token allocations #42685
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Fix the code to ignore parameters from incorrect locations #42878
    area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck Delay and Periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Cleanup AspNetCoreAnalyzers #42757
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • HTTP/3: Complete support for UseHttps #42774
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/3: ValueTask pooling #42760
    area-runtime
